hero.title: Early Learning Studio in Cary for kids 3–7
hero.subtitle: Handwriting, creativity, school readiness, STEM, and more in a warm, premium space where children feel confident and inspired.
hero.card1.title: Handwriting & Fine Motor
hero.card1.text: Gentle practice with fun worksheets, lines, shapes, and letters to prepare little hands for confident writing.
hero.card2.title: Creative Art & Drawing
hero.card2.text: Colors, forms, imagination and storytelling through art – no pressure, only joy and creativity.
hero.card3.title: School Readiness & STEM
hero.card3.text: Logic, numbers, patterns, early science and problem‑solving to make the first school years easier and happier.
why.title: Why parents choose Majestic Dream Cary
why.subtitle: A calm, structured and inspiring environment where every child is seen, heard and supported.
why.point1.title: Focused on real skills
why.point1.text: Handwriting, reading, logic, creativity, early STEM – everything that builds a strong foundation for school and life.
why.point2.title: Small groups & personal attention
why.point2.text: We keep groups intentionally small so your child gets the time, guidance and encouragement they truly need.
why.point3.title: Warm, premium atmosphere
why.point3.text: Pastel colors, soft light, organized materials and clear routines help children feel safe and motivated.
why.point4.title: Partnership with parents
why.point4.text: We share progress, give simple home ideas and stay in touch so you always know how your child is growing.

classes.schoolReadiness.title: School Readiness

classes.creativeArt.title: Creative Art & Drawing

classes.logicStem.title: Logic & STEM for Little Minds
classes.logicStem.text: Patterns, puzzles, simple experiments and early coding logic to build curiosity and problem‑solving.
reviewsPreview.title: What parents say
